description:
If you build and paint Warhammer 40k or Warhammer Age of Sigmar minis, or any scale model, there’s a good chance that you don’t feel like you’re keeping up with your painting backlog. It can be quite a bummer to realize just how much of your collection is sitting unpainted. But there’s no better time for a new start than the new year, and in this guide, I’ve set out my top tips for how to paint more miniatures in 2025 than ever before!

Continue reading Five easy ways to paint more Warhammer in 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Five easy ways to paint more Warhammer in 2025

description:
Hero Forge, an online tool that lets you design and print custom miniatures for Dungeons and Dragons miniatures and other tabletop games, has a distinctive house style: it’s cheerful, heroic, and a little bit World of Warcraft. That’s only if you’re using the basic platform, however: the recently added kitbashing tools open up a whole world of possibilities for grimdark and gruesome original creations.

Continue reading Cute DnD minis be damned - I’m using Hero Forge’s new tools for grimdark evil
title: Cute DnD minis be damned - I’m using Hero Forge’s new tools for grimdark evil
